channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice on SoftLayer API

item.title: emailInvoices
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::emailInvoices Overview Create a transaction to email PDF and/or Excel invoice links to the requesting user’s email address. You must have a PDF reader installed in order to view these files. Parameters Name Type Description options SoftLayer_Container_Billing_Invoice_Email The options for emailing invoices Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values void

item.title: getAccount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getAccount Overview Retrieve the account that an invoice belongs to. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Account

item.title: getAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getAmount Overview Retrieve this is the amount of this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values decimal

item.title: getBrandAtInvoiceCreation
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getBrandAtInvoiceCreation Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Brand

item.title: getDetailedPdfGeneratedFlag
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getDetailedPdfGeneratedFlag Overview Retrieve a flag that will reflect whether the detailed version of the pdf has been generated. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values boolean

item.title: getExcel
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getExcel Overview Retrieve a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet of a SoftLayer invoice. You must have a Microsoft Excel reader installed in order to view these invoice files. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data External Links Microsoft Excel at Wikipedia

item.title: getInvoiceTopLevelItems
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getInvoiceTopLevelItems Overview Retrieve a list of top-level invoice items that are on the currently pending invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item[]

item.title: getInvoiceTotalAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getInvoiceTotalAmount Overview Retrieve the total amount of this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values decimal

item.title: getInvoiceTotalOneTimeAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getInvoiceTotalOneTimeAmount Overview Retrieve the total one-time charges for this invoice. This is the sum of one-time charges + setup fees + labor fees. This does not include taxes. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values decimal

item.title: getInvoiceTotalOneTimeTaxAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getInvoiceTotalOneTimeTaxAmount Overview Retrieve a sum of all the taxes related to one time charges for this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values decimal

item.title: getInvoiceTotalPreTaxAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getInvoiceTotalPreTaxAmount Overview Retrieve the total amount of this invoice. This does not include taxes. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values decimal

item.title: getInvoiceTotalRecurringAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getInvoiceTotalRecurringAmount Overview Retrieve the total Recurring amount of this invoice. This amount does not include taxes or one time charges. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values decimal

item.title: getInvoiceTotalRecurringTaxAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getInvoiceTotalRecurringTaxAmount Overview Retrieve the total amount of the recurring taxes on this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values decimal

item.title: getItems
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getItems Overview Retrieve the items that belong to this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item[]

item.title: getLocalCurrencyExchangeRate
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getLocalCurrencyExchangeRate Overview Retrieve exchange rate used for billing this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_ExchangeRate

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getObject Overview getObject retrieves the SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice object whose ID number corresponds to the ID number of the init parameter passed to the SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice service. You can only retrieve invoices that are assigned to your portal user’s account. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account::getInvoices

item.title: getPayment
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPayment Overview Retrieve this is the total payment made on this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values decimal

item.title: getPayments
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPayments Overview Retrieve the payments for the invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Receivable_Payment[]

item.title: getPdf
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPdf Overview Retrieve a PDF record of a SoftLayer invoice. SoftLayer keeps PDF records of all closed invoices for customer retrieval from the portal and API. You must have a PDF reader installed in order to view these invoice files. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data External Links Portable Document Format at Wikipedia

item.title: getPdfDetailed
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPdfDetailed Overview Retrieve a PDF record of a SoftLayer detailed invoice summary. SoftLayer keeps PDF records of all closed invoices for customer retrieval from the portal and API. You must have a PDF reader installed in order to view these files. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data

item.title: getPdfDetailedFilename
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPdfDetailedFilename Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values string

item.title: getPdfFileSize
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPdfFileSize Overview Retrieve the size of a PDF record of a SoftLayer invoice. SoftLayer keeps PDF records of all closed invoices for customer retrieval from the portal and API. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values integer External Links Portable Document Format at Wikipedia

item.title: getPdfFilename
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPdfFilename Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values string

item.title: getPreliminaryExcel
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPreliminaryExcel Overview Retrieve a Microsoft Excel record of a SoftLayer invoice. SoftLayer generates Microsoft Excel records of all closed invoices for customer retrieval from the portal and API. You must have a Microsoft Excel reader installed in order to view these invoice files. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data External Links Microsoft Excel at Wikipedia

item.title: getPreliminaryPdf
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPreliminaryPdf Overview Retrieve a PDF record of a SoftLayer invoice. SoftLayer keeps PDF records of all closed invoices for customer retrieval from the portal and API. You must have a PDF reader installed in order to view these invoice files. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data External Links Portable Document Format at Wikipedia

item.title: getPreliminaryPdfDetailed
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getPreliminaryPdfDetailed Overview Retrieve a PDF record of the detailed version of a SoftLayer invoice. SoftLayer keeps PDF records of all closed invoices for customer retrieval from the portal and API. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data

item.title: getSellerRegistration
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getSellerRegistration Overview Retrieve this is the seller’s tax registration. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values string

item.title: getTaxInfo
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getTaxInfo Overview Retrieve this is the tax information that applies to tax auditing. This is the official tax record for this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Info

item.title: getTaxInfoHistory
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getTaxInfoHistory Overview Retrieve this is the set of tax information for any tax calculation for this invoice. Note that not all of these are necessarily official, so use the taxInfo key to get the final information. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Info[]

item.title: getTaxMessage
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getTaxMessage Overview Retrieve this is a message explaining the tax treatment for this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values string

item.title: getTaxType
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getTaxType Overview Retrieve this is the strategy used to calculate tax on this invoice. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Type

item.title: getXlsFilename
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getXlsFilename Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values string

item.title: getZeroFeeItemCounts
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getZeroFeeItemCounts Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_InvoiceInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Product_Item_Category_ZeroFee_Count[]
